title: Communication-Aware Design for Distributed Learning and Inference in IoT Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic machine learning concepts and understanding of IoT systems
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based practical training feasible in limited-technology environments (no PC access)

learning_goals: Explain the fundamental principles and practical applications of distributed learning and inference in IoT networks
Analyze the impact of communication channel conditions on learning performance and design optimization strategies
Simulate distributed learning models incorporating Early-Exit strategies and heterogeneous device integration concepts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
